description: During Consensus Hong Kong, we are hosting a private, invitation-only side event for a curated group of senior finance professionals, Web3 founders, investors, traders, and top KOLs from the Crypto space. This is a closed-door gathering designed for high-level conversations, relationship building, and off-record discussions with people who actively influence capital allocation, market narratives, and industry direction across traditional finance and crypto. Attendance is strictly limited. Only registered and approved guests will be admitted. No walk-ins. What to expect: Carefully selected crowd of fund managers, VCs, founders, traders, and Tier-1 influencers in Crypto. High-signal discussions around markets, cycles, capital flows, DeFi, AI, and adoption Elegant social setting with premium drinks and a refined atmosphere No panels, no pitching, no stage pure networking at the highest level Venue: Location shared after registration Date: February 11, 2026 Time: 5:00 PM 7:30 PM (2.5 hours) Access: Registration required Approval only Only registered guests will be admitted If you prefer quality over quantity and value conversations with decision-makers rather than crowds, this private evening is designed for you.
